title: FM Nirmala Sitharaman directs RRBs to leverage CASA ratio for credit growth
description: The minister emphasised on active outreach by RRB branches located in MSME clusters to ensure credit to small and micro enterprises, the statement noted, adding that she also highlighted that sponsor banks and RRBs must recognise the challenges that lie ahead, especially maintaining asset quality, expanding digital services and ensuring robust corporate governance.
